fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Scares: Gain a Negative vote for each player you Kill.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Underground King: Visit the Underground Lair this Night phase on top of a regular room. [1 use, Unique] 
- Rumors: Give a Chaos member a non-special card of your choice. [Infinite uses, 2 CD] 
- Unearth: Choose a player. Learn their True role. [2 uses, 2 CD, Astral, Unique]
- Frame: Select a player to appear as a different role for this phase. Affects up to Uncertain checks. [X uses, Graveyard] *X = (# of Chaos members - 1)* 
- Fearmonger: Pick a player. All information they learn in the next phase will be incorrect. Affects up to Susceptible checks. [X uses, 1 CD, Unique, Graveyard] *X = (# of Chaos members - 2)*
